about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm Afonso Lima, a second-year Computer Engineering student at the Faculty of Engineering of the University of Porto. I work with a focus on front-end development and on building functional, streamlined, and creative solutions.

My main tech stack includes React, Node.js, CSS3, PostgreSQL, and C++. I also have strong knowledge of C, Java, Python, and SQLite, along with solid experience in Git, UML, and UI Design.Outside the digital world, I'm a national boxing champion, an important part of my background and identity.I keep things straightforward: clear problems, direct solutions, and consistent results.
